EmailTemplate.name: EDUT - Register Ticket - No Doc
EmailTemplate.subject: [EDUT] Ticket# {!Case.CaseNumber} has been received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Thank you for your inquiry, a ticket has been created for research and review by a Nokia Global Contact Center Representative. We appreciate your patience and will respond within our estimated completion time:
Content Issues: Up to 5 business days Course not marked as completed: Up to 2 business days Enrollments: 1 to 5 business days depending on the class date Requesting a New Internal Session: Up to 10 business days, with course delivery within 45 days Requesting a New External Session: Up to 4 business days for critical classes, up to 8 business days for non-critical classes
Listed below are the details for your ticket: Ticket#: {!Case.CaseNumber} Subject: {!Case.Subject} Created: {!Case.CreatedDate}
If you have additional questions or require further assistance, please contact us by replying to this email.
Kind Regards, NokiaEDU
Global Contact Center
